program: (PARI) a(n, a=552)={for(i=1, n, a=sigma(a)-a); a} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 24 2018
xref: Cf. A098007 (length of aliquot sequences); some other examples: A008885 (starting at 30) .. A008892 (starting at 276), A014361 (starting at 564) .. A014365 (starting at 1134), see link to index for a more complete list.
